Package light

Class PonctualLight

java.lang.Object
light.PonctualLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILight
public class PonctualLight extends Object implements ILight
Represents a point light source in the scene with a specified color and position.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PonctualLight(Color color, Point position)
    Creates a point light source with the specified color and position.

  • Constructor Details

    • PonctualLight

      public PonctualLight(Color color, Point position)
      Creates a point light source with the specified color and position.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the light source.
      position - The position of the light source in 3D space.

    • getDirection

      public Vector getDirection()
      Get the direction from the light source. (Not applicable for a point light source; returns null)
      Specified by:
      getDirection in interface ILight
      Returns:
      Null since point light sources do not have a specific direction.
